snippet: The cards may be stacked against Democrats, but it’s only a matter of when, not if, the political pendulum will swing back.
lead_paragraph: The cards may be stacked against Democrats, but it’s only a matter of when, not if, the political pendulum will swing back.

headline.seo: In G.O.P.-Dominated Texas, Democrats Wait for Their Opening
headline.main: In a G.O.P.-Dominated State, Democrats Wait for Their Opening
headline.print_headline: In a G.O.P.-Dominated State, Democrats Wait for Their Opening
